sqlMap.select:
select a.zone_code from air_zone_dts a WHERE 1=1
A.ZONE_YY >= #sYear#
A.ZONE_YY <= #eYear#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO AIR_ZONE_DTS ( ZONE_CODE , ZONE_NAM , PRJ_NAM , ZONE_YY , SCALE , GSD_VAL , PROJECTTYPE_CDE , CAMERA_CDE , IMAGE_CDE , DEM_GRID , REMARK , PRJ_INFO_MGNO ) VALUES ( #zoneCode# , #zoneNam# , #prjNam# , #zoneYy# , #scale# , #gsdVal# , #projecttypeCde# , #cameraCde# , #imageCde# , #demGgrid# , #remark# , #prjInfoMgno# )

INSERT INTO AIR_BASEMETA_DTS ( ZONE_CODE , PH_COURSE , PH_NUM , FILE_IDENTIFIER , TARGET_NAME , LANGUAGE , RES_OFFICENAME , RES_POSTNAME , RES_PHONE , RES_FAX , RES_ADDRESS , RES_POSTAL_CODE , META_DATE , META_VERSION , CONST_CO , INPUT_CO , SPATIAL_DATA , DIST_FORMAT_NAME , DIST_FORMAT_VERSION , DIST_OFFICENAME , DIST_POSTNAME , DIST_PHONE , RESOLUTION , QUALITY_TARGET , SCAN , FILM , DOCUMENT , SIGUNGU_NAM , SIGUNGU_CDE ) VALUES ( #zoneCode# , #phCourse# , #phNum# , #fileIdentifier# , #targetName# , #language# , #resOfficename# , #resPostname# , #resPhone# , #resFax# , #resAddress# , #resPostalCode# , #metaDate# , #metaVersion# , #constCo# , #inputCo# , #spatialData# , #distFormatName# , #distFormatVersion# , #distOfficename# , #distPostname# , #distPhone# , #resolution# , #qualityTarget# , #scan# , #film# , #document# , #sigunguNam# , #sigunguCde# )

INSERT INTO AIR_ORIENTMAP_AS ( OBJECTID , ZONE_CODE , ZONE_NAM , PH_COURSE , PH_NUM , STO_IDN , LOC_CDE , FILE_NAM , FILE_FORMA , X_COOR , Y_COOR , ORIGIN , HJD_CDE , ZONE_YY , XMIN , XMAX , YMIN , YMAX , SECURITY_C , MASK_OX , SERV_OX , SHAPE ) VALUES ( #objectid# , #zoneCode# , #zoneNam# , #phCourse# , #phNum# , #stoIdn# , #locCde# , #fileNam# , #fileForma# , #xCoor# , #yCoor# , #origin# , #hjdCde# , #zoneYy# , #xmin# , #xmax# , #ymin# , #ymax# , #securityC# , #maskOx# , #servOx# , #shape# )

INSERT INTO AIR_ORIENTMAP_DTS ( ZONE_CODE , PH_COURSE , PH_NUM , PYOJUNG_ID , MAP_NUM , MAP_NAM , COOR_X , COOR_Y , ORIGIN , COOR_CX , COOR_CY , CRS_IDN , P_COOR_X , P_COOR_Y , P_CRS_IDN ) VALUES ( #zoneCode# , #phCourse# , #phNum# , #pyojungId# , #mapNum# , #mapNam# , #coorX# , #coorY# , #origin# , #coorCx# , #coorCy# , #crsIdn# , #pCoorX# , #pCoorY# , #pCrsIdn# )

INSERT INTO AIR_PRODUCT_DTS ( ZONE_CODE , PH_COURSE , PH_NUM , APH_NUM , APH_NOW , FILM_NUM , FILM_NOW , RPH_NUM , RPH_NOW , MD1_NUM , MD2_NUM , NIX_OX , SCUR_OX , SECURITY_CDE , MASK_OX , SERV_OX , REMARK , NIX_A_OX , NIX_B_OX ) VALUES ( #zoneCode# , #phCourse# , #phNum# , #aphNum# , #aphNow# , #filmNum# , #filmNow# , #rphNum# , #rphNow# , #md1Num# , #md2Num# , #nixOx# , #scurOx# , #securityCde# , #maskOx# , #servOx# , #remark# , #nixAOx# , #nixBOx# )

INSERT INTO AIR_PRODUCTEO_DTS ( ZONE_CODE , PH_COURSE , PH_NUM , EO_X , EO_Y , EO_Z , EO_OMEGA , EO_PHI , EO_KAPPA , CRS_IDN ) VALUES ( #zoneCode# , #phCourse# , #phNum# , #eoX# , #eoY# , #eoZ# , #eoOmega# , #eoPhi# , #eoKappa# , #crsIdn# )

INSERT INTO DEM_BASEMETA_DTS ( ZONE_CODE , MAP5000_NUM , FILE_IDENTIFIER , LANGUAGE , RES_OFFICENAME , RES_POSTNAME , RES_PHONE , RES_FAX , RES_ADDRESS , RES_POSTAL_CODE , META_DATE , META_VERSION , DIST_FORMAT_NAME , DIST_FORMAT_VERSION , DIST_OFFICENAME , DIST_POSTNAME , DIST_PHONE , QUALITY_TARGET , DOCUMENT , TARGET_NAME , SPATIAL_DATA , SIGUNGU_NAM , SIGUNGU_CDE ) VALUES ( #zoneCode# , #map5000Num# , #fileIdentifier# , #language# , #resOfficename# , #resPostname# , #resPhone# , #resFax# , #resAddress# , #resPostalCode# , #metaDate# , #metaVersion# , #distFormatName# , #distFormatVersion# , #distOfficename# , #distPostname# , #distPhone# , #qualityTarget# , #document# , #targetName# , #spatialData# , #sigunguNam# , #sigunguCde# )

INSERT INTO DEM_ORIENTMAP_AS ( OBJECTID , ZONE_CODE , ZONE_NAM , MAP_NUM , MAP_NAM , MAP5000_NUM , MAP5000_NAM , STO_IDN , LOC_CDE , FILE_NAM , FILE_FORMA , X_COOR , Y_COOR , ORIGIN , HJD_CDE , ZONE_YY , XMIN , XMAX , YMIN , YMAX , SECURITY_C , SERV_OX , SHAPE ) VALUES ( #objectid# , #zoneCode# , #zoneNam# , #mapNum# , #mapNam# , #map5000Num# , #map5000Nam# , #stoIdn# , #locCde# , #fileNam# , #fileForma# , #xCoor# , #yCoor# , #origin# , #hjdCde# , #zoneYy# , #xmin# , #xmax# , #ymin# , #ymax# , #securityC# , #servOx# , #shape# )

INSERT INTO DEM_PRODUCT_DTS ( ZONE_CODE , MAP5000_NUM , NAME , MAP5000_NAM , ORIGIN_DATA , ACQ_ORIGIN , ORIGIN_FORM , ORIGIN_YEAR , GRID_INT , UNIT , INTERPOL_METHOD , LB_X , LB_Y , RT_X , RT_Y , CRS_IDN , COORDINATE , ORIGIN , ELEV_NORM , HEIVAR_KIND , MAX_ELEV , MIN_ELEV , DATA_FORM , ACCURACY , PRODUCER , PUBLISHER , REFERENCE , PRP , SECURITY_CDE , DTD_OX , SHADED_IMG_OX , OBS_RGS_OX , FLIGHT_PLAN_OX , GPSINS_OX , GPS_BP_OX , P_LB_X , P_LB_Y , P_RT_X , P_RT_Y , P_CRS_IDN , IMAGE_CDE ) VALUES ( #zoneCode# , #map5000Num# , #name# , #map5000Nam# , #originData# , #acqOrigin# , #originForm# , #originYear# , #gridInt# , #unit# , #interpolMethod# , #lbX# , #lbY# , #rtX# , #rtY# , #crsIdn# , #coordinate# , #origin# , #elevNorm# , #heivarKind# , #maxElev# , #minElev# , #dataForm# , #accuracy# , #producer# , #publisher# , #reference# , #prp# , #securityCde# , #dtdOx# , #shadedImgOx# , #obsRgsOx# , #flightPlanOx# , #gpsinsOx# , #gpsBpOx# , #pLbX# , #pLbY# , #pRtX# , #pRtY# , #pCrsIdn# , #imageCde# )

INSERT INTO ORT_BASEMETA_DTS ( ZONE_CODE , MAP5000_NUM , FILE_IDENTIFIER , LANGUAGE , RES_OFFICENAME , RES_POSTNAME , RES_PHONE , RES_FAX , RES_ADDRESS , RES_POSTAL_CODE , META_DATE , META_VERSION , DIST_FORMAT_NAME , DIST_FORMAT_VERSION , DIST_OFFICENAME , DIST_POSTNAME , DIST_PHONE , QUALITY_TARGET , DOCUMENT , TARGET_NAME , SPATIAL_DATA , SIGUNGU_NAM , SIGUNGU_CDE ) VALUES ( #zoneCode# , #map5000Num# , #fileIdentifier# , #language# , #resOfficename# , #resPostname# , #resPhone# , #resFax# , #resAddress# , #resPostalCode# , #metaDate# , #metaVersion# , #distFormatName# , #distFormatVersion# , #distOfficename# , #distPostname# , #distPhone# , #qualityTarget# , #document# , #targetName# , #spatialData# , #sigunguNam# , #sigunguCde# )

INSERT INTO ORT_ORIENTMAP_AS ( OBJECTID , ZONE_CODE , ZONE_NAM , MAP_NUM , MAP_NAM , MAP5000_NUM , MAP5000_NAM , STO_IDN , LOC_CDE , FILE_NAM , FILE_FORMA , X_COOR , Y_COOR , ORIGIN , HJD_CDE , ZONE_YY , XMIN , XMAX , YMIN , YMAX , SECURITY_C , MASK_OX , SERV_OX , SCLAE_RELA , SHAPE ) VALUES ( 0 , #zoneCode# , #zoneNam# , #mapNum# , #mapNam# , #map5000Num# , #map5000Nam# , #stoIdn# , #locCde# , #fileNam# , #fileForma# , #xCoor# , #yCoor# , #origin# , #hjdCde# , #zoneYy# , #xmin# , #xmax# , #ymin# , #ymax# , #securityC# , #maskOx# , #servOx# , #sclaeRela# , #shape# )

INSERT INTO ORT_PRODUCT_DTS ( ZONE_CODE , MAP5000_NUM , MAP5000_NAM , SCALE , GTYP_DST , CONST_CO , INPUT_CO , ORIGIN , WORK_YMD , MASK_OX , ORIGIN_IMG , SECURITY_CDE , REFERENCE , PRP , COLOR_GBN , USED_DEM , CMR_TYPE , SAT_NAM , CRS_IDN , P_CRS_IDN , IMAGE_CDE , SCALE_RELAC ) VALUES ( #zoneCode# , #map5000Num# , #map5000Nam# , #scale# , #gtypDst# , #constCo# , #inputCo# , #origin# , #workYmd# , #maskOx# , #originImg# , #securityCde# , #reference# , #prp# , #colorGbn# , #usedDem# , #cmrType# , #satNam# , #crsIdn# , #pCrsIdn# , #imageCde# , #scaleRelac# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT STO_IDN, STO_DRV, STO_NAM FROM STO_INFO_DTS
SELECT CODE_CDE, CATALOG_CDE, CODE_CNT, FOLDER_NAM FROM CMT_STORAGE_CDE
SELECT trim(STO_DRV) as STO_DRV FROM STO_INFO_DTS WHERE STO_IDN=#stoIdn#
SELECT FOLDER_NAM FROM CMT_STORAGE_CDE WHERE CODE_CDE = #storageCde#
sqlMap.insert: /* smartMapDAO.insertOrtLoc */ INSERT INTO STO_ORTLOC_DTS (ZONE_CODE, MAP5000_NUM, STORAGE_CDE, FILE_NAM, FILE_FORMAT, FILE_SIZE, STO_IDN, MAP_NUM, FILE_EXT) VALUES (#zoneCode#, #map5000Num#, #storageCde#, #fileNam# ,#fileFormat#, #fileSize#, #stoIdn#, #mapNum#, #fileExt#)

/* smartMapDAO.insertAirLoc */ INSERT INTO STO_AIRLOC_DTS (ZONE_CODE, PH_COURSE, PH_NUM, STORAGE_CDE, FILE_NAM, FILE_FORMAT, FILE_SIZE, STO_IDN, FILE_EXT) VALUES (#zoneCode#, #phCourse#, #phNum#, #storageCde#, #fileNam# ,#fileFormat#, #fileSize#, #stoIdn#, #fileExt#)
